XRLayerEvent.summary: NOTE Experimental The XRLayerEvent interface of the WebXR Device API is the event type for events related to a change of state of an object. These events occur, for example, when the layer needs to be redrawn.

XRLayerEventXRLayerEvent.summary: NOTE Experimental The XRLayerEvent constructor creates and returns a new object. These events relate to a change of state of an object.
XRLayerEventXRLayerEvent.returns:
A new object representing an object of the
specified type and configured as described by the eventInitDict parameter.

XRLayerEventLayer.summary: NOTE Experimental The layer property of the interface is a reference to the which generated the event.
